text: geugeos-eun hananimkkeseo mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bog-eum jung-ui hanala illeogalodoe naega igeos-eulo neohuiege bosang-eul guhaji anihana gakkaun cheoncheog-e daehan salang-eun je-oe la nugudeunji seon-eul haenghaneun ja hana nim-eun geuege geugeos-eulo bosang-eul deohayeo jul geos-ila sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong gwa seonhaeng-e bodabhasineun bun-isila
